trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la classe di base per tutti i file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) Compensating.

trans-unit.source: The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator.
trans-unit.target: L'utente deve essere esteso da questo oggetto per scrivere una transazione personalizzata alla classe Compensator.

trans-unit.source: A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it.
trans-unit.target: Una classe Compensator deve sempre avere un costruttore pubblico. in caso contrario, il motore di ripristino non Ã¨ possibile crearlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: creare un file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: Offre un record di log per il file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) di compensazione durante la fase di interruzione.

trans-unit.source: The log record to be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Il record di log da recapitare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il record recapitato deve essere omesso; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the abort phase of the transaction completion, and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) di, la fase di interruzione del completamento della transazione e il recapito futura dei record.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to begin abort phase; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>iniziare la fase di interruzione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the commit phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) della fase di commit del completamento della transazione e il recapito futura dei record.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to begin commit phase; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>iniziare la fase di commit. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the prepare phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) della fase di preparazione del completamento della transazione e il recapito futura dei record.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta il file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: Recapita un record di log in avanti durante la fase di commit.

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: Il record di log per l'inoltro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il record recapitato deve essere omesso; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has received all the log records available during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) che ha ricevuto tutti i record di log disponibili durante la fase di interruzione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has delivered all the log records available during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) che ha recapitato tutti i record di log disponibili durante la fase di commit.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has had all the log records available during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il compensatore del file system distribuito (CRM, Compensating Resource Manager) che ha ricevuto tutti i record di log disponibili durante la fase di preparazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ha esito positivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: Recapita un record di log in avanti durante la fase di preparazione.

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: Il record di log per l'inoltro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il record recapitato deve essere omesso; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
